casebody.data:
Kevin BRAY and the Kernersville Professional Fire Fighters Association
v.
Curtis L. SWISHER, in his capacity as Town Manager of the Town of Kernersville No. 179P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, Michelle D. Connell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John G. Wolfe, III, Attorney at Law, Kernersville, for Swisher, Curtis L. M. Travis Payne, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Bray, Kevin, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of June 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

The following order has been entered on the Conditional motion filed on the 6th of June 2017 by Defendant to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
